trends: There have been no other sightings in Trion
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: long triangle seen through 12.5 inch telescope against moon background power on scope was just enough to see only moon in it.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at moon through telescope when the ufo flew throug line of site. It's shape was a long wedge shape much longer that wide. It had no lights at all, It appeard to be closer to moon than to earth. It appeared to be very large.as soon as it crosed the moon it disapeared in the darkness. No Sound. It gave the impression to be floating, I wish that I could have had a photo no time to get camera and load film. In relations to earth it was traveling north north east. Clifford Mahan Ps There is not any airplane on earth like this.
